name: January (litrouke)
description:
January is a dynamic fiction novel detailing one year in the life of a man after the apocalypse.

Approximately 25k words with illustrations by addictivities. Placed 7th in IFComp 2022. Content warnings for suicide, trauma, gore, and strong language.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ ❖ ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ "Beautiful multimedia nonlinear zombie game in grim world."
- Mathbrush "A complete work that is both grounded, visceral, and epic and has things to say about the cyclical nature of life, death, change, and mortality."
- Hanon Ondricek "If you come to IF largely focused on the interactivity, this one might not be for you, but if the fiction side looms larger for you, there might not be a better game in the Comp."
- Mike Russo
